firm_information.name: CENTURY 21 Capital Team
firm_information.location: 1600 S. PLEASANT VALLEY RD Austin, TX 78741

house_listing.house_description: Lovely home on 3+ acres with beutiful hard wood, carpet, & tile floors. Master bedroom has full bath & walk in closet & is located on opposite side from other bedrooms. Fireplace & vaulted ceiling with very nice easy to clean tile floor in family room, formal living room with carpet up front, both rooms have a bay window with seat that has storage space under them. Indoor utility room plus storage room. Three separate fenced areas for backyard, pets, horses & or whatever. large Gazebo, covered front porch, easy access to city or new airport! Don't miss this one! 512-448-5952
